text:
Steps to reproduce

Step : Go to registration form

Step : Checking for email validation

Step :  without email format it accepting the values like eg. Jyothi.com 

          Actual format: it should accepts only as email format like @ with domain name eg. jyothi@gmail.com
The Tomcat project just provides the application server used to host that site. It is not responsible for providing the software for the site content.
creator: markt@apache.org
